summary: An aging doorman is forced to face the scorn of his friends, neighbors and society after being fired from his prestigious job at a luxurious hotel.
cast: Emil Jannings|Maly Delschaft|Max Hiller|Emilie Kurz|Hans Unterkircher|Olaf Storm|Hermann Vallentin|Georg John|Emmy Wyda|O.E. Hasse|Harald Madsen|Neumann-Schüler|Carl Schenstrøm|Erich Schönfelder
title: El último
